channel.title: Couple questions: VB .net
channel.description: Figured out everything, wasn't letting me declare a 2d array outside of the sub i wanted to use it in so i just c&p'd it to every procedure i wanted to use it in and i was set, gave up on image tilesets, just made 50 hidden images and swap the main image with them

item.title: Couple questions: VB .net
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

Figured out everything, wasn’t letting me declare a 2d array outside of the sub i wanted to use it in so i just c&p’d it to every procedure i wanted to use it in and i was set, gave up on image tilesets, just made 50 hidden images and swap the main image with them
